instructions: Put the dinner plate at the bottom side of the table cloth
Put the salad plate in the center of the dinner plate.
Put the napkin in the center of the salad plate
Put the wine glass at the upper right hand corner of the table cloth
put the water glass to the right, and slightly below the wine glass.
put the salad fork on the far left side of the dinner plate, with the tines pointing up
Put the dinner fork between the dinner plate and salad fork, with the tines pointing up
put the dinner knife directly to the right of the dinner plate, pointing toward the wine glass
Put the soup spoon to the right of the dinner knife, pointing toward the water glass
